Text:
Does this version sounds better than:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7781075/Deep_Purple_-_Machine_Head-40th_Ann_%5BADVD%5D%5BOF%5D_Remaster_2012

If you are using multichannel input to your receiver with Dvd audio player MLP Losless is a better sound format than Dts 96/24 Bit.
This Iso file is a clone copy of original Dvd audio disc so it has not been change from original disc.

Yes I know that this is a slightly better format, but I still wonder if it sounds better?
;)
The 2012 version in 5.1 sounds really good.
:)

I haven't heard benyalux version so i can't tell you which one is better, all of the old tracks are remastered from analogue tapes so you are just going to have to listen to both of them and compare them. I still reckon when i listen to Machine head on vinyl it's the best.

Ok. Thx for your answers.
:)
I still have it on an old picture LP, maybe I should give it a listen too.
:)
No problem, stay tuned lots more uploads to come.
